pr_title: [risk=no][RW-5120] Replace login component route with react

timeline.bodyText: IIRC we're going to end up accumulating a few more of these bound Angular type functions until we delete all the Angular so here is a place to stick them all instead of writing them out a few thousand times
timeline.author: als364

timeline.bodyText: This may be new since I wrote this Angular wrapping of the react router, but it was missing from here and whereas it was in the SignInComponent Angular wrapper
timeline.author: als364

timeline.bodyText: renamed mostly so it's less confusing when we pass it around in the router
timeline.author: als364
